description:
When Yuuko Yoshida wakes up one morning to discover that she’s sprouted horns and a tail, she learns something that her mother has been meaning to tell her. You know that battle between the Light and Dark that’s been going on since the dawn of time? Well, Yuuko’s family are the bad guys.

So now, Yuuko has to defeat a local magical girl to win back some of her family’s vanquished power so they can afford to go to the all-you-can-eat pancake restaurant. And, of course, it turns out that the Magical Girl goes to Yuuko’s school, but Momo’s really nice and keeps rescuing Yuuko, which is pretty embarrassing and leaves Yuuko rather conflicted… but… all you can eat pancakes?

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

title.native: まちカドまぞく みに

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/izumo_ito)
Married to [Sayuri Ooba](https://anilist.co/staff/106263/).
He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大塚舞)

Originating from [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/). Currently freelance.

Aspired to become an animator after having seen [Densetsu no Yuusha Da Garn](https://anilist.co/anime/2803/).

__Agency:__ Office Osawa

She is a voice actress affiliated with Office Osawa.

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Mona](https://anilist.co/character/209678/Megistus-Mona) - Genshin Impact (VG)

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)

**Height:** 161cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/izumo_ito)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomoyo_t_1014)
[Profile](https://toyromusic.com/artists/?name=tsujibayashi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsvaci)
[Profile](https://toyromusic.com/artists/?name=tsujibayashi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsvaci)
[Profile](https://toyromusic.com/artists/?name=tsujibayashi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsvaci)

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.
Yoshio Ookouchi is a composite artist affiliated with A-1 Pictures.
Shinichi Nakamura is a producer working for Pony Canyon.
Previously working at Tavac, now for Real-T.
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岩浪美和) | [Twitter](https://x.com/i/user/169097071)

Assistant planner at Houbunsha.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [Capcom employee](https://anilist.co/staff/237972/)._
Junichirou Tanaka is a producer working for TBS.
Affiliated with [J.C. Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7).
